content.question: Which of the following expressions can be determined using the slope of the best-fit line?

choices.label: <math alttext="m sub 1, times m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m sub 1, over m sub 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub 1, and denominator, open parenthesis, m sub 1, plus m sub 2, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub 2, and denominator, open parenthesis, m sub 1, plus m sub 2, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, m sub 1, minus m sub 2, close parenthesis, and denominator, open parenthesis, m sub 1, plus m sub 2, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>âˆ’</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub 1, and denominator, open parenthesis, m sub 1, plus m sub 2, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
